text: Henri Christophe "Chris" Dickerson (August 25, 1939 - December 23, 2021) was an American professional bodybuilder. He was born in Montgomery, Alabama. He won Mr. Olympia in 1982. He retired in 1994. Dickerson died on December 23, 2021 at the age of 82.1982 Mr. Olympia Chris Dickerson Reportedly Dies At Age 82 ==References== ==Other websites== *IFBB Hall of Fame Category:1939 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American bodybuilders Category:Sportspeople from Montgomery, Alabama
title: Chris Dickerson (bodybuilder)
